screen.radial.editor.title: Edit Radial Slot
screen.radial.editor.name: Slot Name
screen.radial.config.title: Radial Menu Layout Configuration
screen.radial.config.description.main: Radial by velolib - A simple and opinionated Minecraft radial menu.
screen.radial.config.description.left_cl: Left-click a slot in-game to trigger its action.
screen.radial.config.description.right_c: Right-click a slot in-game to edit its command or keybind.
screen.radial.config.slot_count.tooltip: How many slices the menu is divided into.
screen.radial.config.radius.tooltip: Distance from the center to each slot.
screen.radial.config.inner_padding.toolt: How far inward the cursor can be while still selecting a slot.
screen.radial.config.outer_reach.tooltip: How far outward the cursor can go before losing selection.
screen.radial.config.animation_speed.too: Duration of the fly-out animation. 0 is instant.
modmenu.descriptionTranslate.modmenu: A simple and opinionated Minecraft radial menu.
